channel.title: About on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in About on Security365 Docs

item.title: Test current speed
item.description: Test current speedBefore you begin using APO, we recommend testing your current site speed. Your site speed results give your website a letter grade and performance rating. Visit GTmetrix External link icon Open external link . In the text field, enter your website’s URL. Click Test your site. After the test runs, you can view your site’s grade, performance rating, and other performance metrics.

item.title: Plugin compatibility
item.description: Plugin compatibilityCurrently, WordPress offers over 50,000 plugins for download. As a result, testing the compatibility between APO and every available plugin is impossible. However, Cloudflare has a list of officially supported plugins and a list of plugins known to cause issues when APO is enabled. For questions about a specific plugin not shown in the list, create a thread in the Cloudflare Community External link icon Open external link to begin the conversation.
